articles.title: Arvind Kejriwal Slams PM, Accuses BJP Of "Dostvaad" Over Loan Write Offs
articles.description: Coming down heavily at PM Modi and the Centre over the "free revdi" remark, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal slammed the union government for waiving off debts"worth Rs 10 lakh crore" of those he alleged were close to the government.
articles.content:
He accused the BJP of 'dostvaad' (favouring friends) and Congress of 'parivarvaad' (dynastic politics).
